headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MHK and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Mohawk Industries has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 15.8% to $132.33 per share while the index has gained 17.5%.
